comments.body: What does "incomplete" mean? Does it mean that the robot will read the commit hash from the local repo in the GOPATH?

if you import a package (of some staging repo) you have not imported before, the Godeps.json before this PR did not change (if the aother package of the same staging repo was already imported). We only run a complete godep restore+save if the Godeps.json changes (if not, we only replace the staging repo sha1s with a simple sed).

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +84,88 @@        # x-out staging repo revisions. They will only be known when the publisher bot has created the final export.
        # We keep the staging dependencies in here though to give the publisher bot a way to detect when the staging
        # dependencies changed. If they have changed, the bot will run a complete godep restore+save. If they didn't
        # it will avoid that step, which takes quite some time.
        jq '.Deps |= map((select(.ImportPath | (startswith("k8s.io/'${repo}'/") or . == "k8s.io/'${repo}'")) | .Rev |= "xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx") // .)' |

comments.body: no, it's inside docker and we use jq elsewhere inside the container.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +80,84 @@    for repo in $(ls -1 ${KUBE_ROOT}/staging/src/k8s.io); do
      # remove staging prefix
      jq '.Deps |= map(.ImportPath |= ltrimstr("k8s.io/kubernetes/staging/src/"))' Godeps/Godeps.json |

        # x-out staging repo revisions. They will only be known when the publisher bot has created the final export.
